If it is blank after the = sign, then that means that that string can be ignored until further notice. ## TABLE OF CONTENTS FOR THIS DOCUMENT AS OF AUGUST 11 2008: ## FORM ACCESS WARNING ## GLOBAL ELEMENTS USED IN MORE THAN ONE FORM ## GLOBAL REQUIRED FIELDS WARNING ## LEAVING FORM DIALOG ## CREATE A RESOURCE FROM SCRATCH FORM ## CURRIKI LESSON PLAN FORM ## NORTEL LEARNIT LESSON PLAN FORM ## ACE LESSON PLAN FORM ## FROM SCRATCH ERROR MESSAGES ## LESSON PLAN ERROR MESSAGES ## GLOBAL SET REQUIRED INFORMATION MODULE CONTENT ## ASSET CLASS ## ADD PATH SELECTION DIALOGS ## ADD PATH FINAL MESSAGE DIALOGS ## ADD PATH ERROR MESSAGE ## TRANS CONTENT BEGINS HERE: ## FORM ACCESS WARNING createresources.needaccount= ??? ????? ???????? ??????????????? ??????? ???????????? ??????????????? logged in ?????? ???????? ????????. ## GLOBAL ELEMENTS USED IN MORE THAN ONE FORM ## STEP 3 form.scratch.step3.header=Step 3. ???????? ???????????? ??????????? ????? ??????. form.scratch.step3.instruction=??????? ????????? ???? ??? ???? ??? ??????? ?????? ?????? ???????? ??????? ????????????? ??????? ??? ??????? ????????? ## STEP 4 (used in From Scratch, CSLP, and NLLP forms; partial use in ACELP) form.scratch.step4.header=Step 4. ????????? ??????? ??????????? form.scratch.step4.instruction=???????? ??????? ???????? ?????? ?????????? ?????? ??????????? ????????? ???????????.

"Scratch" (Simple Wiki Document) ????????? ????????? form.scratch.title.description=??? ????? ?????? ???????????????? ?????? ????????????.?????? ???. : form.title.description.link1=????????? form.title.description.link1.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/SampleWikiResources?bc=;Coll_curriki.SampleModelResourcesCreatedUsingForms form.title.description.link3=???? form.title.description.link3.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/CreatingResourceswithFormsTemplates?bc=;Coll_curriki.CurrikiHelp form.title.description.link2=???????? ??????????? ??????? form.title.description.link2.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Main/AboutCurrikiReviewSystem form.title.description.link2.thumbnail=/xwiki/skins/curriki8/icons/CRS.png ## FROM SCRATCH STEP 1 form.scratch.step1.header=Step 1. ?????????? ???????? ??? ???????. form.scratch.step1.instruction=What details will best describe and present this resource in search results
and other listings? form.scratch.title_title=???????: form.scratch.title_txt=??????????? ??????? ?????? ????????????? ??????? ?????? (??????? ???????????). form.scratch.title_tooltip=This title will be displayed in listings (such as search results) and should help you and others quickly identify this resource. form.scratch.description_title=??????: form.scratch.description_txt=Enter a detailed description of the content and/or purpose of this resource. form.scratch.description_tooltip=This description appears when people find your resource in listings. If this resource is part of a larger instructional context, you may wish to describe this relationship. ## FROM SCRATCH STEP 2 form.scratch.step2.header=Step 2. Enter & Format Content form.scratch.step2.instruction=???? ?????????? ?????? ???????? ????? ????????? form.scratch.step2.content.title=??????????: form.scratch.step2.content.instruction=Enter content in the editing window below. Format and develop your material with the buttons on the editing toolbar. ## CURRIKI LESSON PLAN (CSLP) FORM ## CSLP TITLE AREA lesson.plan.url=/xwiki/bin/view/CreateResources/CurrikiStandardLessonPlan lesson.plan.title=Create a Resource from a Template (Curriki Standard Lesson Plan) lesson.plan.title.description=Learn more: lesson.plan.title.description.link1=????????? lesson.plan.title.description.link1.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/ModelLessonsfromCurrikisForm-BasedTemplate lesson.plan.title.description.link3=???? lesson.plan.title.description.link3.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/CreatingResourceswithFormsTemplates?bc=;Coll_curriki.CurrikiHelp lesson.plan.title.description.link2=???????? ??????????? ??????? lesson.plan.title.description.link2.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Main/AboutCurrikiReviewSystem lesson.plan.title.description.link2.thumbnail=/xwiki/skins/curriki8/icons/CRS.png ## CSLP STEP 1 lesson.plan.step1.header=Step 1. Enter Basic Information lesson.plan.step1.instruction=How would you describe and categorize this resource for yourself
and other educators? lesson.plan.title_title=???????: lesson.plan.title_txt=?????? ???????????? ??????? 250 ???????????????? ???????????? ??? ??????? (??????? ?????) lesson.plan.title_tooltip=This title will be displayed in listings (such as search results) and should help you and others quickly identify this resource. lesson.plan.description_title=??????: lesson.plan.description_txt=Provide a high-level description of this lesson's purpose, concepts and skills it addresses, and/or the lesson's learning activities, methods, or procedures. lesson.plan.description_tooltip=This description appears when people find your resource in listings. If this lesson is part of a larger instructional context, you may wish to describe this relationship. ##CSLP STEP 2 lesson.plan.step2.header=Step 2. Enter & Format Lesson Content lesson.plan.step2.instruction=What would another educator need to know to successfully put this lesson
into practice? lesson.plan.introduction.title=????????: lesson.plan.introduction.instruction= lesson.plan.introduction.content= lesson.plan.introduction.tooltip=What is the context for this lesson? What are any pre-requisites for student knowledge or skills? How much time is required? lesson.plan.group.size.title=???? ????: lesson.plan.group.size.instruction= lesson.plan.group.size.content1=?????? lesson.plan.group.size.content2=???? ??????? lesson.plan.group.size.content3=????? ???? lesson.plan.group.size.content4=????????????? lesson.plan.group.size.content5=?????? ?????????? lesson.plan.group.size.tooltip=What is the ideal composition of students for this lesson? lesson.plan.learning.objectives.title=?????? ?????????? : lesson.plan.learning.objectives.instruction=Enter the lesson's learning objectives in the editing window below. Format and develop your material with the buttons on the editing toolbar. lesson.plan.learning.objectives.content= lesson.plan.learning.objectives.tooltip=What should students know and be able to do after completing this lesson? lesson.plan.guiding.question.title=?????????? ?????????: lesson.plan.guiding.question.instruction= lesson.plan.guiding.question.content= lesson.plan.guiding.question.tooltip=What key question will you share with students to guide their discussion and efforts in this lesson? lesson.plan.materials.title=??????????????: lesson.plan.materials.instruction= lesson.plan.materials.content= lesson.plan.materials.tooltip=What supplies, books, special equipment, software, or other materials are required for this lesson? lesson.plan.procedures.title=??????????? : lesson.plan.procedures.instruction=Enter the lesson procedures in the editing window below. Format your material or attach files using the editing toolbar. lesson.plan.procedures.content= lesson.plan.procedures.tooltip=What instructions can you supply to ensure that you and others successfully carry out the intended instruction during this lesson? lesson.plan.assessment.title=?????????: lesson.plan.assessment.instruction=Enter text in the field to describe the assessment to be used. lesson.plan.assessment.content= lesson.plan.assessment.tooltip=How can you assess the new knowledge and skills of students? lesson.plan.answer.key.title=????? ????????? or Rubric: lesson.plan.answer.key.instruction=List answers in the space below, or develop a rubric by creating a table with the editing toolbar. lesson.plan.answer.key.content= lesson.plan.answer.key.tooltip=What criteria can be used to clarify expectations with students or quantify the assessment? lesson.plan.standards.title=Benchmark or ??????? : lesson.plan.standards.instruction= lesson.plan.standards.content= lesson.plan.standards.tooltip=What standards or expectations does the lesson address, and in which framework? lesson.plan.required.attachments.title=Required Attachments: lesson.plan.required.attachments.instruction=Select and upload files from your computer. Attached files cannot exceed 20 MB in total. These will be offered as links in the published lesson plan. lesson.plan.required.attachments.file.attached=Files that you attach to this resource do not appear as independent contributions on Curriki; they are presented only as hyperlinks within this resource, and they are covered by the license for this resource.

After submitting this form, please consider adding curricular materials to Curriki as standalone resources, so these contributions can be discovered and reused more easily. lesson.plan.attachments.title=Attached Files: lesson.plan.required.attachments.tooltip=Attach any files referenced in the lesson, such as a handout, rubric, worksheet, or quiz. lesson.plan.attachments.browse.button=???? lesson.plan.attachments.attach.button=???????????? ??????? lesson.plan.attachments.delete=?????? lesson.plan.file.size.maximum=20000000 lesson.plan.file.size.label=Total size of all attachments: lesson.plan.file.size.oversize=Attachments to this resource cannot exceed 20 MB in total. To save this resource, you must use "remove" link in "Required Attachments" to reduce total size of attachments. Please upload any additional files as standalone Curriki contribution instead of attaching it to this resource. lesson.plan.file.size.dialog=Attachments to this resource cannot exceed 20 MB in total. You may want to upload this file as a standalone Curriki contribution instead of attaching it to this resource. lesson.plan.file.size.dialog.button=??? ##NORTEL LEARNIT (NLLP) LESSON PLAN FORM ##NLLP TITLE AREA nortel.lesson.plan.url=/xwiki/bin/view/CreateResources/NortelLearniTLessonPlan nortel.lesson.plan.title=Create a Lesson Plan (Nortel LearniT 6E + S Template) nortel.lesson.plan.title.description=
Learn more: nortel.form.title.description.link1=????????? nortel.form.title.description.link1.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/ModelLessonsfromNortelLearniTs6ETemplate?bc=;Coll_NortelLearniT.NortelLearniT6ESForm nortel.form.title.description.link2=Detailed Help on Using the Form nortel.form.title.description.link2.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_NortelLearniT/NortelLearniT6ESForm?bc nortel.form.title.description.link3= nortel.form.title.description.link3.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Demo/nortellearnit nortel.form.title.description.link4=About 6E + S Lesson Plans nortel.form.title.description.link4.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_NortelLearniT/6eslessonplan?bc=;Coll_NortelLearniT.NortelLearniT6ESForm ##NLLP STEP 1 nortel.lesson.plan.title_title=???????: nortel.lesson.plan.title_txt=Enter a title for your resource. Use no more than 250 characters (including spaces). nortel.lesson.plan.title_tooltip=This title will be displayed in listings (such as search results) and should help you and others quickly identify the resource. Please observe proper spacing, capitalization, and punctuation to ensure a correct record display for users. nortel.lesson.plan.description_title=??????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.description_txt=Provide a high-level description of the purpose of this lesson, concepts and skills it addresses, and/or the lesson's learning activities, methods, or procedures. nortel.lesson.plan.description_tooltip=This description appears when people roll over the title of the resource. It is also searchable text that may help users locate it. If this lesson is part of a larger instructional context, you may wish to describe the relationship(s). ##NLLP STEP 2 nortel.lesson.plan.step2.title=Enter & Format Lesson Content nortel.lesson.plan.step2.guidingquestion=What would another educator need to know to successfully put this lesson into practice? nortel.lesson.plan.overview.title=?????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.overview.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.overview.content= nortel.lesson.plan.overview.tooltip=Enter basic lesson description. Include brief learning objectives, student project formats. nortel.lesson.plan.techinteg.title=??????????? ????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.techinteg.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.techinteg.content= nortel.lesson.plan.techinteg.tooltip=Indicate technologies/media students use, e.g., presentations, digital cameras, to explore/demonstrate topic understanding. nortel.lesson.plan.prereq.title=??????????? ?????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.prereq.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.prereq.content= nortel.lesson.plan.prereq.tooltip=What pre-understandings (e.g., content) or capabilities (e.g., PowerPoint) do the students/teachers need? nortel.lesson.plan.preptime.title=Teacher Prep Time: nortel.lesson.plan.preptime.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.preptime.content= nortel.lesson.plan.preptime.tooltip=Indicate time needed and pre-lesson steps and coordination. nortel.lesson.plan.timecomplete.title=???????????????????? ?????????????? ?????: nortel.lesson.plan.timecomplete.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.timecomplete.content= nortel.lesson.plan.timecomplete.tooltip=Enter total lesson time frame. nortel.lesson.plan.materials.title=??????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.materials.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.materials.content= nortel.lesson.plan.materials.tooltip=Enter supplies, handouts, equipment, software, books, resources, connectivity needed. nortel.lesson.plan.project.title=???????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.project.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.project.content= nortel.lesson.plan.project.tooltip=Describe student project(s) in some detail, including how they will pursue and present information. nortel.lesson.plan.timemanagement.title=??? ??????????? ????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.timemanagement.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.timemanagement.content= nortel.lesson.plan.timemanagement.tooltip=Provide hints about how to pace the lesson. nortel.lesson.plan.assess.title=????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.assess.instruction= nortel.lesson.plan.assess.content= nortel.lesson.plan.assess.tooltip=Briefly indicate ongoing evaluation techniques for key student understandings. Note: Use Evaluate for detailed rubric(s). nortel.lesson.plan.engage.title=?? ?????????: nortel.lesson.plan.engage.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Engage. nortel.lesson.plan.engage.content= nortel.lesson.plan.engage.tooltip=Indicate specific activities to capture student interest and encourage questioning leading to topic exploration. nortel.lesson.plan.explore.title=??????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.explore.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Explore. nortel.lesson.plan.explore.content= nortel.lesson.plan.explore.tooltip=Indicate activities and related technologies for student to perform/use to investigate the topic. nortel.lesson.plan.explain.title=??????: nortel.lesson.plan.explain.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Explain. nortel.lesson.plan.explain.content= nortel.lesson.plan.explain.tooltip=Indicate the presentations or outputs and formats students will make and use to demonstrate new knowledge, understandings, capabilities. nortel.lesson.plan.elaborate.title=??????? : nortel.lesson.plan.elaborate.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Elaborate. nortel.lesson.plan.elaborate.content= nortel.lesson.plan.elaborate.tooltip=Provide instructions on the specific project the student creates from the lesson plan activity. nortel.lesson.plan.evaluate.title=???????? : nortel.lesson.plan.evaluate.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Evaluate. nortel.lesson.plan.evaluate.content= nortel.lesson.plan.evaluate.tooltip=Provide/describe the rubric/method for evaluating learning of students as expressed in their activities/outputs. nortel.lesson.plan.extend.title=??????: nortel.lesson.plan.extend.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Extend. nortel.lesson.plan.extend.content= nortel.lesson.plan.extend.tooltip=Frame some student-driven ways to expand existing investigations; communicate learning to others; apply knowledge in new circumstances. nortel.lesson.plan.standards.title=????????? : nortel.lesson.plan.standards.instruction=Enter and format your material using the WYSIWYG toolbar. Get Toolbar Help. View a video on Standards. nortel.lesson.plan.standards.content= nortel.lesson.plan.standards.tooltip=Indicate standards/frameworks the lesson addresses. nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.title=??????????? ??????? : nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.instruction=Select and upload files from your computer. Attached files cannot exceed 20 MB in total. These will be offered as links in the published lesson plan. nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.tooltip=Attach any files referenced in this lesson, such as a handout, rubric, worksheet, or quiz. nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.file.attached=Files that you attach to this resource do not appear as independent contributions on Curriki; they are presented only as hyperlinks within this resource, and they are covered by the license for this resource.

After submitting this form, please consider adding curricular materials to Curriki as standalone resources, so these contributions can be discovered and reused more easily. nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.browse.button=????? nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.attach.button=??????????? ??? nortel.lesson.plan.required.attachments.delete=?????? ## NLLP OUTPUT ## see macros.vm: macro currikiNortelIcon() nortel.lesson.plan.output.heading.icon.url=/xwiki/bin/download/CreateResources/NortelLearniTLessonPlan/NlorgCurrikiHP.png nortel.lesson.plan.output.heading.icon.height=75 nortel.lesson.plan.output.heading.icon.width=225 nortel.lesson.plan.output.heading.content=This lesson was created using the Nortel LearniT 6E + S template for integrating technology within the curriculum. ## ACE LESSON PLAN FORM ## ACELP TITLE AREA ace.lesson.plan.url=/xwiki/bin/view/CreateResources/ACELessonPlan ace.lesson.plan.title=Create a Resource from a Template (ACE Lesson Plan) ace.lesson.plan.title.description=Learn more: ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link1=??????? ??????? ?????? ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link1.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_ACETeam/BackgroundandModels ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link3=???? ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link3.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Coll_curriki/UsingtheACELessonPlanForm?bc=;Coll_curriki.CurrikiHelp;Coll_curriki.CreatingResourceswithFormsTemplates ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link2=?????????? ?????????? ???????? ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link2.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Demo/ace ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link2.thumbnail.url=http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Demo/ace ace.lesson.plan.title.description.link2.thumbnail=/xwiki/bin/download/CreateResources/ACELessonPlan/CIAACEsmall.JPG ## ACELP STEP 1 ace.lesson.plan.step1.header=Step 1. Enter Basic Information ace.lesson.plan.step1.instruction=How would you describe and categorize this lesson for yourself
and other educators? ace.lesson.plan.title_title=???????: ace.lesson.plan.title_txt=Enter a title of no more than 250 characters (including spaces) for your lesson. ace.lesson.plan.title_tooltip=This title will be displayed in listings (such as search results) and should help you and others quickly identify it. ace.lesson.plan.description_title=??????: ace.lesson.plan.description_txt=Provide a description of this lesson's purpose, the general concepts and skills it addresses, and/or the lesson's learning activities, methods, or procedures. If this lesson is part of a unit, indicate the unit goal and where this lesson falls chronologically in the unit. ace.lesson.plan.description_tooltip=This description appears when people find your resource in listings. ## ACELP STEP 2 ace.lesson.plan.step2.header=Step 2. Enter & Format Lesson Content ace.lesson.plan.step2.instruction=What would another educator need to know to successfully put this lesson
into practice? ##CORRECT DISPLAY STRINGS FOR NUMBER OF DAYS ace.lesson.plan.introduction.title=????????? ??????? : ace.lesson.plan.introduction.instruction=Enter the estimated number of class days it will take students to meet the lesson plan objective. ace.lesson.plan.introduction.content= ace.lesson.plan.introduction.tooltip=Lesson plans that are 2-4 days in length help students connect discrete ideas or skills into larger, more complex concepts. ace.lesson.plan.number.days.title=Number of Days: ##CORRECT DISPLAY STRINGS FOR PRIOR KNOWLEDGE ace.lesson.plan.group.size.title=???? ????? : ace.lesson.plan.group.size.instruction=Describe what students need to know and be able to do in order to participate in this lesson's learning tasks and methods. ace.lesson.plan.group.size.content= ace.lesson.plan.group.size.tooltip=This may include concepts and skills covered in previous lessons, units, or grades. ace.lesson.plan.prior.knowledge.title=???? ????? : ##CORRECT DISPLAY FOR LESSON OBJECTIVE ace.lesson.plan.learning.objectives.title=?????????????? : ace.lesson.plan.learning.objectives.instruction=Articulate what students will know and be able to do by the end of the lesson. ace.lesson.plan.learning.objectives.content= ace.lesson.plan.learning.objectives.tooltip=Effective lesson plan objectives often ask students to connect ideas across several days, and build toward the unit goal. ace.lesson.plan.lesson.objective.title=?????????????? : ##CORRECT DISPLAY FOR LESSON ASSESSMENT ace.lesson.plan.assessment.title=??? ?????????: ace.lesson.plan.assessment.instruction=Describe the individual and independent assessment for the lesson. Upload any supplemental files under Required Attachments below. ace.lesson.plan.assessment.content= ace.lesson.plan.assessment.tooltip=Include quizzes or other formal, summative assessments for the whole lesson; informal, formative assessment for each lesson day could also be cited here. ace.lesson.plan.lesson.assessment.title=??? ?????????: ##CORRECT DISPLAY FOR BENCHMARK OR STANDARDS ace.lesson.plan.standards.title=Benchmark or Standards: ace.lesson.plan.standards.instruction=Cite benchmarks or standards addressed during the lesson. ace.lesson.plan.standards.content= ace.lesson.plan.standards.tooltip=It may be useful to include a reference for this citation, such as URLs for accessing the relevant standards documents. ace.lesson.plan.benchmark.standards.title=Benchmark or Standards: ##CORRECT DISPLAY FOR MATERIALS ace.lesson.plan.materials.title=??????????? ????: ace.lesson.plan.materials.instruction=List all handouts, worksheets, presentation slides, lab equipment, etc. needed to carry out the lesson. Upload any supplemental files under Required Attachments below. ace.lesson.plan.materials.content= ace.lesson.plan.materials.tooltip=Be explicit about audio/video or other special equipment this lesson requires. ace.lesson.plan.materials.needed.title=??????????? ????: ace.lesson.plan.enrichment.title=??????????? : ace.lesson.plan.enrichment.instruction=Identify experiences that would allow students to probe concepts at a deeper level. ace.lesson.plan.enrichment.content= ace.lesson.plan.enrichment.tooltip=This may include questions, assignments, project ideas, or connections to other lessons. ace.lesson.plan.accommodations.title=???????? : ace.lesson.plan.accommodations.instruction=Identify modifications for specific students or groups of students that might be necessary to help them meet the lesson objective. ace.lesson.plan.accommodations.content= ace.lesson.plan.accommodations.tooltip=Include any specific ideas/strategies you suggest for conducting this lesson with learners of different types. ace.lesson.plan.anticipated.problems.title=????????????? ???????????: ace.lesson.plan.anticipated.problems.instruction=Describe common challenges that the instructor might encounter during the lesson, or other procedural pitfalls related to student learning. ace.lesson.plan.anticipated.problems.content= ace.lesson.plan.anticipated.problems.tooltip=For example, you might include here any common student misconceptions, or how to manage classroom transitions. ace.lesson.plan.procedures.title=???????????: ace.lesson.plan.procedures.instruction=Enter the details of how this lesson is carried out. In each row, include the time allotted for each task, the learning tasks that will take place during that time, and the methods or procedures utilized to accomplish that learning task. ace.lesson.plan.procedures.content= ace.lesson.plan.procedures.tooltip=What instructions can you supply to ensure that you and others successfully carry out the intended instruction during this lesson? ace.lesson.plan.procedures.time.tooltip=Indicate the number of minutes or time interval for each day’s learning tasks. ace.lesson.plan.procedures.learningtask.tooltip=Articulate student-centered goals, instructions, activity descriptions, and lecture questions. ace.lesson.plan.procedures.methods.tooltip=State how the learning task will be accomplished, (e.g., individual/pair/group work, direct instruction, or by other teaching methods). ace.lesson.plan.procedures.row1.time_sample=Day 1 ace.lesson.plan.procedures.row2.time_sample=Sample:10 min ace.lesson.plan.procedures.row2.learningtask_sample=Sample: Students practice summarizing the plot of a story. ace.lesson.plan.procedures.row2.methodorprocedure_sample=Sample: Work in pairs. ace.lesson.plan.procedures.table.null=?????????? ?????????? ????? . ace.lesson.plan.procedures.addrow=????? ????? ??? ace.lesson.plan.required.attachments.title=??????????? ???????: ace.lesson.plan.required.attachments.instruction=Select and upload files from your computer. Attached files cannot exceed 20 MB in total. These will be offered as links in the published lesson plan. ace.lesson.plan.required.attachments.file.attached=Files that you attach to this resource do not appear as independent contributions on Curriki; they are presented only as hyperlinks within this resource, and they are covered by the license for this resource.

After submitting this form, please consider adding curricular materials to Curriki as standalone resources, so these contributions can be discovered and reused more easily. ace.lesson.plan.attachments.title=???????????? ???? : ace.lesson.plan.required.attachments.tooltip=Attach any files referenced in the lesson, such as a handout, rubric, worksheet, or quiz. ace.lesson.plan.attachments.browse.button=????? ace.lesson.plan.attachments.attach.button=???? ?????? ??? ace.lesson.plan.attachments.delete=?????? ace.lesson.plan.file.size.maximum=20000000 ace.lesson.plan.file.size.label=??????? ????????????????? ????? ???? : ace.lesson.plan.file.size.oversize=Attachments to this resource cannot exceed 20 MB in total. To save this resource, you must use "remove" link in "Required Attachments" to reduce total size of attachments. Please upload any additional files as standalone Curriki contribution instead of attaching it to this resource. ace.lesson.plan.file.size.dialog=Attachments to this resource cannot exceed 20 MB in total. You may want to upload this file as a standalone Curriki contribution instead of attaching it to this resource. ace.lesson.plan.file.size.dialog.button=??? ## ACELP STEP 4 form.scratch.step4.header=Step 4. Review & Submit ##CORRECT DISPLAY FOR STEP 4 ace.form.scratch.step4.instruction=Review your entries one last time before you click Submit.

If your content is not ready for others to see or use, remember to set the Access Privileges to "Private" above.

Note that there are two fields, Changes for Next Time and What Worked Well, that will appear in your resource upon submission. These will appear with placeholder content that should be updated after you have implemented this lesson. When you're ready to update this content, click "Edit" for this resource. form.scratch.submit.button=???????? form.scratch.cancel.button=??????? ## ACELP OUTPUT ONLY ace.lesson.plan.output.heading.icon.url=/xwiki/bin/download/CreateResources/ACELessonPlan/ACElogo.png ace.lesson.plan.output.heading.icon.height=118 ace.lesson.plan.output.heading.icon.width=147 ace.lesson.plan.output.heading.content=This lesson plan was created based on a template developed for the Curriculum, Instruction & Assessment initiative sponsored by the Alliance for Catholic Education. ace.lesson.plan.changes_heading=Changes for Next Time: ace.lesson.plan.changes_content=Here the lesson author can reflect on changes for future years. After executing the lesson in the classroom, the member can edit this section of the wiki resource to describe changes for making the lesson more effective next time ace.lesson.plan.whatworked_heading=What Worked Well: ace.lesson.plan.whatworked_content=After executing the lesson in the classroom, edit the wiki resource to highlight particularly effective activities or assessments for reference in future years. ## FROM SCRATCH ERROR MESSAGES form.scratch.title.more.250=You entered more than 250 characters into the Title field in Step 1. Please shorten the text in this field. form.scratch.required.fields.dialog=Please complete the following required field(s): form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.title=- ??????? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.description=- ?????? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.subject=- ?????? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.level=- ????? ???? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.ict=- ??????? ????????? ????? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.content=- ?????????? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.rights=- ????? ???????? form.scratch.required.fields.dialog.button=??? ## LESSON PLAN ERROR MESSAGES ## This list includes error messages for all lesson plan forms where fields with these titles are used. Some forms may share some titles. Not all fields are in play in all forms. Please see specs for form formats/contents, including outlines of included and required elements, and their titles. ## Standard instruction line at top of error message for lesson plan forms: lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog=Please complete the following required field(s): ## The following fields are required metadata for all lesson plan forms. lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.title=- ??????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.description=-?????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.subject=- ?????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.level=- ????? ???? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.rights=- ????? ???????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.button=??? ## The following fields are required in specific forms, as per specs. ## CSLP Form lesson.plan.title.more.250=You entered more than 250 characters into the Title field in Step 1. Please shorten the text in this field. lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.learning.objectives=- Learning Objectives lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.procedures=- Procedures ## NLLP Form nortel.lesson.plan.title.more.250=You entered more than 250 characters into the Title field in Step 1. Please shorten the text in this field. lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.overview=- ?????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.techinteg=- ??????????? ???????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.prereq=-???? ??????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.preptime=- Teacher Prep Time lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.timecomplete=-???????????? ???????????? ????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.materials=- ??????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.project=-???????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.timemanagement=- ??? ??????????? ????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.assess=- ????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.engage=- ???????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.explore=- ??????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.explain=- ????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.elaborate=- ??????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.evaluate=- ???????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.extend=- ???? ## ACELP Form ace.lesson.plan.title.more.250=You entered more than 250 characters into the Title field in Step 1. Please shorten the text in this field. lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.priorknowledge=- ???? ????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.numberdays=- ????????? ??????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.lessonobjective=- ?????????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.lessonassessment=- ??? ????????? lesson.plan.required.fields.dialog.procedures=- ??????????? ## GLOBAL SET REQUIRED INFORMATION MODULE CONTENT ## TITLE OF THE RESOURCE sri.title_title=Title: sri.title_txt=If you copied this resource, update this field to indicate how it is different from the original. ##Appears as default text in the text entry box. sri.title_content= sri.title_tooltip=Name for this element, including display in search lists and as a caption for images ## DESCRIPTION sri.description_title=????????? : sri.description_txt=If you copied this resource, update this field to indicate how it is different from the original. ## To be used later when edit is implemented sri.copy_info_text=If you have copied this resource, update the Title and Description fields to indicate how it is different from the original. sri.description_tooltip=When people read this description they should know what your resource is. The more detail the better! ## SUBJECT sri.fw_items_title=?????????? : sri.fw_items_txt=Click arrows to expand or collapse subjects. sri.fw_items_tooltip=Topic(s) that apply to your resource ##Subject tree content can be found below. ## EDUCATIONAL LEVEL ## DEPRICATED sri.educational_level_title=????? ????: sri.educational_level_txt=Select one or more level(s). sri.educational_level_content= sri.educational_level_tooltip=Level(s) for which your resource is appropriate ## CURRENT sri.educational_level2_title=????? ????: sri.educational_level2_txt=Select one or more level(s). sri.educational_level2_content= sri.educational_level2_tooltip=Level(s) for which your resource is appropriate ## INSTRUCTIONAL COMPONENT TYPE sri.instructional_component2_title=??????? ????????? ????? : sri.instructional_component2_txt=Scroll to find the best option. You can select multiple options by hitting the Ctrl (PC) or Apple (Mac) key as you click to select. Click here for definitions. sri.instructional_component2_content= sri.instructional_component2_tooltip=Type or format of content that best matches your resource ## ICT list is below in Asset Class ## KEY WORDS sri.keywords_title=??????? ??????? : sri.keywords_txt= sri.keywords_content= sri.keywords_tooltip=Words to help people find your resource when searching Curriki or the Internet ## LANGUAGE sri.language_title=???? : sri.language_txt= sri.language_content= sri.language_tooltip=The language for this resource ##Language choices are located below. ## HIDE FROM SEARCH sri.hidden_from_search_title=????????? ??????? ??? : sri.hidden_from_search_txt=Some content is not suitable for display in search results, because it does not offer value to the community as a standalone element.

If this is such an element (for instance, a table) that only makes sense within the context of a larger resource (like a lesson plan), please click below so this element will not appear in search results. sri.hidden_from_search_tooltip=Hides this element so that it will not be returned in search results sri.hidden_from_search_after=Do not show this element in search results. ## RIGHT HOLDERS sri.right_holder_title= ????? ???????? (s): sri.right_holder_txt= sri.right_holder_content= sri.right_holder_tooltip=??????????? ???????? (s) names for this asset ## ACCESS PRIVELEGES sri.rights_title=???????? ???????? : sri.rights_txt=Select Private to keep your material in "draft" until it is ready to be released
into the repository for general use. sri.rights_tooltip=This setting determines who has the rights to view or edit any resource. sri.rights_content= ## LICENSE DEED sri.license_type_title=????? ?????? : sri.license_type_txt=Please be sure you have read and understand the Terms of Use and that you have the rights to contribute this content.

The Curriki-compatible license provides maximum flexibility to the community, so members can use and modify others' contributions. The default Curriki license is a widely used Creative Commons license Attribution 3.0. If you wish to assign another license, please select from the drop-down list below. To learn about all the Creative Commons licenses, please click here. sri.license_type_heading=Set License Deed: sri.license_type_tooltip=License protecting this content sri.license_type_content= ## ASSET CLASS: Derived from the AssetClass ## SUBJECT ## Moved to GlobalClassTranslation by Todd on 08-05-2008 ## EDUCATIONAL LEVEL ## Moved to GlobalClassTranslation by Todd on 08-05-2008 ## ICT ## Moved to GlobalClassTranslation by Todd on 08-05-2008 ## ACCESS RIGHTS ## Moved to GlobalClassTranslation by Todd on 08-05-2008 ## LANGUAGE ## Moved to GlobalClassTranslation by Todd on 08-05-2008 ## LICENSES ## Moved to the GlobalClassTranslation file by Todd Aug-05-2008 ## ## ADD PATH SELECTION DIALOGS ##Set Required Information, Part 1 add.setrequiredinfo.part1.title=Set Required Information, Part 1 add.setrequiredinfo.part1.guidingquestion=What details will best describe and present this resource in search results and other listings? add.setrequiredinfo.part2.next.button=??????? >> ##Contribute Menu add.contributemenu.title_addto_site=???????????? ??? add.contributemenu.title_addto_composite=??????????? ???? ??????? ??? add.contributemenu.guidingquestion_addto_site=??????? add.contributemenu.option.video_upload=?????????? ??????? ???????? add.contributemenu.option.link=?????? ???? ??????????? ??????? add.contributemenu.link.empty_msg=http:// add.contributemenu.option.repository=???????????? Once uploaded, select Continue to complete the process. add.contributemenu.required.fields.dialog_link=Enter the URL for the web resource using the format http://www.website.com, then click Next. add.contributemenu.required.fields.dialog_video_capture=Capture a video with your webcam. Once recorded, select Continue to complete the process. add.contributemenu.cancel.button=??????? add.contributemenu.next.button=??????? >> ## SELECT A TEMPLATE DIALOG add.selecttemplate.title=???????? ?????? ????????? add.selecttemplate.guidingquestion=What kind of lesson plan would you like to create? add.selecttemplate.list1.header=Curriki Standard Lesson Plan add.selecttemplate.list1.description=The standard Curriki template offers the simplest lesson structure, with Learning Objectives and Procedures as the only required content. add.selecttemplate.list1.thumbnail=/xwiki/bin/download/CreateResources/TemplateThumbnails/CurrikiStandardLessonPlanThumb.png add.selecttemplate.list1.url=/xwiki/bin/view/CreateResources/CurrikiStandardLessonPlan add.selecttemplate.list2.header=Nortel LearniT Lesson Plan add.selecttemplate.list2.description=Nortel LearniT provides a project-based, technology-integrated template incorporating experiences that Engage, Explore, Explain, Elaborate, Evaluate, and Extend learning, with the option to include Standards. add.selecttemplate.list2.thumbnail=/xwiki/bin/download/CreateResources/TemplateThumbnails/NortelLessonPlanThumb.png add.selecttemplate.list2.url=/xwiki/bin/view/CreateResources/NortelLearniTLessonPlan add.selecttemplate.list3.header=ACE Lesson Plan add.selecttemplate.list3.description=The Alliance for Catholic Education provides a template in which lesson details are formatted in a table showing time, learning task, and methods or procedures. add.selecttemplate.list3.thumbnail=/xwiki/bin/download/CreateResources/TemplateThumbnails/ACELessonPlanThumb.PNG add.selecttemplate.list3.url=/xwiki/bin/view/CreateResources/ACELessonPlan add.selecttemplate.cancel.button=??????? add.selecttemplate.next.button=??????? >> ##Choose a Location add.chooselocation.title=?????? ?????? ??????? add.chooselocation.guidingquestion=????? ??? ?????? ???????? ? add.chooselocation.instruction=Drag the resource to drop it in the correct location. Hover over a folder or collection to open its contents and place the resource in a specific spot. add.chooselocation.instruction_short=Click to drag and drop this: add.chooselocation.resource_unavailable= -- resource unavailable -- add.chooselocation.cancel.button=??????? add.chooselocation.next.button=??????? >> ##ADD PATH FINAL MESSAGE DIALOGS ##Dialog Titles add.finalmessage.title_successful=??????????? ?????????????????? add.finalmessage.title_resource=???? ?????????????????? add.finalmessage.title_folder=?????? ?????????????????? add.finalmessage.title_collection=???????? ?????????????????? ##Operation Successful Messages add.finalmessage.text_resource_success=?????? ???? ??????????? ??????????????????? ??????? ?????? ???? ???????????? ??????? . add.finalmessage.text_resource_simple_success=Y?????? ???? ??????????? ???????????????????. add.finalmessage.text_collection_success=????? ????????? ??????????? ?????????????????? . ##Note the dynamic content in the link below where {0} is the title of the newly added resource and {1} is the title of the folder or collection into which {0} was added: add.finalmessage.text_addto_success=??????? ??????????? ???????????????? {0} into {1}. ##Note the dynamic content in the link below where {0} is the title of the newly added folder and {1} is the title of the folder or collection into which {1} was added: add.finalmessage.text_addto_folder_success=??????? ??????????? ???? ???????????? ???????????????? {0} into {1}. "Build Up" ? ???? ?????????? ???? ???????? ???????? ??????? ????????????? add.finalmessage.text_groupcollection_tip2=Click "Edit" to open the Currikulum Builder, where you can build up and organize this collection. ##Navigation Options add.finalmessage.add.link=???? add.finalmessage.favorites.link=???? ???????????? ???? add.finalmessage.contributions.link=???? ?????????????? ???? add.finalmessage.collections.link=???? ???????????? ???? add.finalmessage.view.link=???? ##Note the dynamic content in the link below where {0} is the title of the folder or collection to which the member has just added the resource: add.finalmessage.viewtarget.link=????{0} add.finalmessage.continue.link=????? >> add.finalmessage.openbuilder.link=Open in Currikulum Builder add.finalmessage.close.button=???? ##Add Path Error Messages add.servertimedout.message.title=?????? ???? add.servertimedout.message.text=??????????? ????????? ???? ???????? ?????????????? . add.servertimedout.message.button=??? {/pre}
